Blackstorm:

"Of course, Maxima"said the femme "what favor?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima soared on. She contemplated however, about the 2 joining 
her. How in 
> the world so many came with her, she didn't know. 1 was too many 
in her 
> opinion. This personal mission she wished to keep secret. If the 
others found 
> out... then the future as well as the past would possibly be 
destroyed. 
> A terrible twist panged her lasercore. She couldn't allow that to 
happen to 
> the one she swore loyalty to many years ago. 
> 
> Glancing back at Blackstorm & Battera, she opened her com. >"I 
know you were 
> to stay with me, Blackstorm. However, if you go further than a 
certain 
> point.... even I will not allow it."< She pondered a moment as she 
wished she 
> had her form back at the thought of her destination. 
> 
> "Battera.. Blackstorm... if you both would kindly do me a 
favor..." Maxima 
> smirked.
